section.class: component component-builder component-builder-2 content text-center narrow col-1

img.p: Welcome to Legacy Glendale, a tuition-free, public charter school in Glendale, AZ. At Legacy, we teach like you’d teach — Traditional, but not ordinary. We focus on a comprehensive, back-to-basics education from kindergarten to 8th grade focusing on direct instruction to help build character and reinforce an accelerated curriculum. We also emphasize a well-rounded school day by making time for music, language, performing arts, and athletics. Come see what makes Legacy Glendale so amazing!

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-3 content text-left border col-2

div.p: As a public charter school, we are always accepting applications for all grades. Learn more about life at Legacy by scheduling an in-person tour.

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-5 content text-left border

img.alt: Legacy Traditional Charter School in Glendale, AZ
Legacy Traditional Charter School in Glendale, AZ

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-7 content text-left border col-3

div.p: Our Tuition-Free Half-Day Kindergarten program in Glendale empowers young learners to be ready for school and set them up for success in life. Legacy Traditional teachers focus on activities that will help your child develop in areas of language, math, reading readiness, and creativity.

img.alt: Elementary School student in Glendale, AZ
Elementary School student in Glendale, AZ

div.p: Legacy Glendale has seen great success with our Back-to-Basics approach to elementary school including an accelerated pace of Language Arts and mathematics, high expectations for academics and behavior, self-contained K-6 classrooms, bell-to-bell instruction, and more.

img.alt: Middle School student in Glendale, AZ
Middle School student in Glendale, AZ

div.p: At Legacy Traditional, we’ve selected proven curriculum and programs designed to help each student. You’ll see that our experience and knowledge has led to a comprehensive set of tools for the middle school grades which prepares students to succeed in high school, college, and further study.

section.class: component component-builder component-builder-9 content text-center narrow col-1

div.h2: Start your child’s life at Legacy
div.p: We care about your child just like you do, and we want the very best for them, too. There is no better way to prepare them for future success than with a well-rounded education at Legacy Glendale.
